channel.title: Help with moparscape
channel.description:
ok every time i open up moparscape i get this
[11:01:59] Starting MoparScape 3.0 [11:01:59] Playing 0-hangar.mid [11:01:59] [11:01:59] [11:01:59] Loaded 0 random handlers [11:01:59] # Loading controllers [11:01:59] Loading config from ./Aryan/Configs/defaults.txt [11:02:00] [11:02:00] News: MoparScape 3.1 is now released, download it from [11:02:00] News: http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html [11:02:00] News: Or use the webclient at moparisthebest.com [11:02:00] News: I am now shutting down your moparscape 3.0 [11:02:00] News: [11:02:00] News: -moparisthebest Exception in thread "Thread-6" java.lang.NullPointerException: HDC for component
at sun.java2d.loops.DrawGlyphList.DrawGlyphList(Native Method) at sun.java2d.pipe.SolidTextRenderer.drawGlyphList(Unknown Source) at sun.java2d.pipe.GlyphListPipe.drawString(Unknown Source) at sun.java2d.SunGraphics2D.drawString(Unknown Source) at Applet_Sub1.method13(Applet_Sub1.java:519) at client.method13(client.java:3458) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:50) at client.run(client.java:4655) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .
how do i make it work again?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 10:57:21 PM[/size][hr]nevermin i fixed it:)

item.title: Help with moparscape
item.dc:creator: @jince jince
item.description:
@jince wrote:

ok every time i open up moparscape i get this

[11:01:59] Starting MoparScape 3.0
[11:01:59] Playing 0-hangar.mid
[11:01:59]
[11:01:59]
[11:01:59] Loaded 0 random handlers
[11:01:59] # Loading controllers
[11:01:59] Loading config from ./Aryan/Configs/defaults.txt
[11:02:00]
[11:02:00] News: MoparScape 3.1 is now released, download it from
[11:02:00] News: http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html
[11:02:00] News: Or use the webclient at moparisthebest.com
[11:02:00] News: I am now shutting down your moparscape 3.0
[11:02:00] News:
[11:02:00] News: -moparisthebest
Exception in thread “Thread-6” java.lang.NullPointerException: HDC for component

    at sun.java2d.loops.DrawGlyphList.DrawGlyphList(Native Method)
    at sun.java2d.pipe.SolidTextRenderer.drawGlyphList(Unknown Source)
    at sun.java2d.pipe.GlyphListPipe.drawString(Unknown Source)
    at sun.java2d.SunGraphics2D.drawString(Unknown Source)
    at Applet_Sub1.method13(Applet_Sub1.java:519)
    at client.method13(client.java:3458)
    at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:50)
    at client.run(client.java:4655)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Press any key to continue . . .

how do i make it work again?[br][size=1]Posted at: October 22, 2006, 10:57:21 PM[/size][hr]nevermin i fixed it:)
